scripts.slither: forge clean && forge build --skip test script --build-info && slither . --ignore-compile
scripts.forge-deploy:build: cd lib/forge-deploy && cargo build --release && cp target/release/forge-deploy ../../forge-deploy
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:sol && pnpm run prettier:check
scripts.lint:sol: forge fmt --check && npx solhint "{script,src}/**/*.sol" --ignore-path .solhintignore && npx solhint "{test}/**/*.sol" --config .solhint.test.json --ignore-path .solhintignore
scripts.lint:sol:fix: forge fmt && npx solhint --fix --noPrompt "{script,src}/**/*.sol" --ignore-path .solhintignore && npx solhint --fix --noPrompt "{test}/**/*.sol" --config .solhint.test.json --ignore-path .solhintignore
